mapper.sql: SELECT MEMBER_NO memberNo, MEMBER_ID memberId, MEMBER_PW memberPw, NAME, EMAIL, TELL, ADDR1, ADDR2, POSTCODE, BIRTH, STATUS, RESDATE FROM MEMBER

SELECT M.MEMBER_NO memberNo, M.MEMBER_ID memberId, M.NAME name, M.TELL tell, M.ADDR1 addr1, M.ADDR2 addr2, M.POSTCODE postcode, M.STATUS status, M.RESDATE resdate, SUM(PO.POINT_AMOUNT) CURRENT_POINT AS currentPoint FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN POINT PO ON M.MEMBER_NO = PO.MEMBER_NO WHERE M.MEMBER_ID != 'admin'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, NAME, EMAIL, TELL, ADDR1, ADDR2, POSTCODE, BIRTH ) VALUES ( member_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{tell}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{postcode}, #{birth} )
INSERT INTO MEMBER_GENRE ( TAG_NO, MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( #{tagNo}, member_SEQ.CURRVAL )
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID memberId, MEMBER_PW memberPw, NAME, EMAIL FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND NAME = #{name} AND EMAIL = #{email}
AND STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY M.MEMBER_ID, M.NAME, M.RESDATE, M.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY M.MEMBER_NO ASC;
AND STATUS = 'N' GROUP BY M.MEMBER_ID, M.NAME, M.RESDATE, M.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY M.MEMBER_NO ASC;

SELECT M.MEMBER_NO memberNo, M.MEMBER_ID memberId, M.NAME name, M.TELL tell, M.ADDR1 addr1, M.ADDR2 addr2, M.POSTCODE postcode, M.STATUS status, M.BIRTH birth, M.EMAIL email, M.RESDATE resdate, SUM(PO.POINT_AMOUNT) pointAmount FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN POINT PO ON M.MEMBER_NO = PO.MEMBER_NO WHERE M.MEMBER_ID != 'admin' GROUP BY M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_ID, M.NAME, M.TELL, M.ADDR1, M.ADDR2, M.POSTCODE, M.STATUS, M.RESDATE, M.BIRTH, M.EMAIL ORDER BY M.MEMBER_NO ASC
